User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user account in the Cosmic Orbit application. User authentication will be handled by Firebase.

id.description: Unique identifier for the user. (Primary Key)

username.description: The user's chosen username, unique within the application.

email.description: The user's email address, used for communication and account recovery.

avatar.description: URL of the user's avatar image.

bio.description: A short biography or 'about me' section for the user's profile.

karma.description: The user's accumulated karma points, reflecting their contributions to the community.

joinedSystems.description: References to the Systems (communities) the user has joined. (Relationship: User 1:N SystemMembership)

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the user account was created.

Post.title: Post
Post.description: A post made by a user within a system.

System.title: System
System.description: A community or forum, called a System.

Comment.title: Comment
Comment.description: A comment made by a user on a post.

definition.description: Stores user profile information. Uses path-based ownership for data privacy. The 'userId' parameter corresponds to the Firebase Auth UID.

params.name: userId
params.description: The unique ID of the user, matching their Firebase Auth UID.

definition.description: Stores all posts across all systems.

params.name: postId
params.description: The unique ID of the post.

definition.description: Stores comments for a specific post.

params.name: postId
params.description: The ID of the post being commented on.

params.name: commentId
params.description: The unique ID of the comment.

definition.description: Stores information about each community system.

params.name: systemId
params.description: The unique ID of the system.

definition.description: Stores a user's vote on a specific post.
